channel.title: Comments on: New Worlds of Wonder

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: Eh.... I've just lately joined Guild Wars and pulled a few guildmates with me. I figure it if I play it slowly and alternate between it and WoW I just might be able to make it last long enough to make it to <a href="http://lotro.turbine.com/" rel="nofollow">LoTR Online</a>. I keep telling myself that the rule is wait 6 months *after* the release of a major MMO. But in the years and years that I've been playing, my MMO whore-self can't hold out on my crack addiction to MMOs.
item.content:encoded: Eh…. I’ve just lately joined Guild Wars and pulled a few guildmates with me. I figure it if I play it slowly and alternate between it and WoW I just might be able to make it last long enough to make it to LoTR Online. I keep telling myself that the rule is wait 6 months *after* the release of a major MMO. But in the years and years that I’ve been playing, my MMO whore-self can’t hold out on my crack addiction to MMOs.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: So much for Christmas saving their ass.
item.content:encoded: So much for Christmas saving their ass.

item.title: By: Abalieno
item.dc:creator: Abalieno
item.description: DDO has just been delayed to next year.
item.content:encoded: DDO has just been delayed to next year.
